name: Live Mate
briefDescription: Live Mate helps you find compatible roommates quickly with easy search filters and secure messaging. It's designed to simplify your roommate hunt with a clean and reliable interface.
challenge: Designing the structure was a challenging task as I was still kinda new to Programming.
futurePlan: I'll be implementing payments here with Stripe and also try to improve the color theme.

name: Bengal Wander
briefDescription: Bengal Wander offers an easy way to explore and book travel packages with detailed info and smooth booking. It's built to make travel planning simple and enjoyable.
challenge: Adding payments option with Stripe was really testing my patience.
futurePlan: Adding better dark mode compatibility and more payment options with better UI.

name: Study Sphere
briefDescription: Study Sphere lets you create, share, and submit assignments with friends to support collaborative learning. It's designed for easy study and better academic progress.
challenge: Implementing Dark Mode here properly was tough. Previously I was going with whatever daisyUI had as the defaults. But, on this one I really tried to implement a proper dark mode theme
futurePlan: Rebuilding this in Next.js for better SEO.
